reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major learning disability subtypes: specific reading disability/dyslexia (~6%), mathematics disorder/dyscalculia (~2%), written expression disorder (~1%), language-based learning disabilities (~5%), other specific learning disabilities (~3%) = ~12% of school-age population. Estimated ~180 per 100k as incidence proxy for annual new diagnoses. Data expressed as prevalence converted to incidence equivalent.
